```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(polite)
library(stringr)

url <- "https://www.amazon.com/s?k=gaming+apparel&_encoding=UTF8&content-id=amzn1.sym.09483392-9ac6-434a-a3d7-39d83662f54a&pd_rd_r=6f89a4d5-dba2-4e55-a1a2-d96e1f4ed24a&pd_rd_w=ZcbTl&pd_rd_wg=Mi21M&pf_rd_p=09483392-9ac6-434a-a3d7-39d83662f54a&pf_rd_r=54Y32N62KZ83MAZMBG55&ref=pd_gw_unk"

session <- bow(url, user_agent = "Educational Purposes")
session
```



```{r}
url1 <- "https://www.amazon.com/Video-Gamer-Men-Boys-Kids/dp/B0C3RQX7XN/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?_encoding=UTF8&content-id=amzn1.sym.09483392-9ac6-434a-a3d7-39d83662f54a&keywords=gaming+apparel&pd_rd_r=6f89a4d5-dba2-4e55-a1a2-d96e1f4ed24a&pd_rd_w=ZcbTl&pd_rd_wg=Mi21M&pf_rd_p=09483392-9ac6-434a-a3d7-39d83662f54a&pf_rd_r=54Y32N62KZ83MAZMBG55&qid=1707353481&sr=8-1-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGY&psc=1"
  
  shirt <- read_html(url1)

#name
onename <- shirt %>%
  html_nodes("h1") %>%
  html_text()

onename
```


```{r}
oneprice <- shirt %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-price-whole") %>%
  html_text()

pers <- oneprice[1]
pers
```


```{r}
oneratings <- shirt %>%
  html_nodes("span.acrCustomerReviewText") %>%
  html_text()


rate <- oneratings[1]
rate
```


```{r}
onerev <- shirt %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-size-base") %>%
  html_text()

rev <- onerev[1]
rev
```



```{r}
frame1 <- data.frame(
  Name = onename, 
  Price = pers, 
  Ratings = rate,
  Review = rev
)

frame1

```
